quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Lego and Company
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, christiansen, kirk. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these statements is NOT true about the Cold War?

options.text: There was never any actual warfare in the Cold War.
It was partly a clash of very different ideologies.
It began soon after World War Two ended, partly because of Soviet domination of Eastern Europe.
Nuclear weapons were a threat to both sides in the Cold War.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: There was never any actual warfare in the Cold War.

questions.question: Harry Potter character Sirius Black was an Animagi meaning that he could take the form of an animal. What animal could he emulate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A dog

questions.question: In what year did Godtfred Kirk Christiansen become Junior Vice President of the LEGO company?
What is the name of the revolutionary LEGO series of 28 sets and 8 vehicles, launched in 1955?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: LEGO System of Play

questions.question: During this year the Lego company, founded by Ole Kirk Christiansen, was devastated by a fire.
Ole Kirk Christiansen, the founder of the LEGO Group, started producing wooden toys in what year?
Which house of Hogwarts was fictional character Sirius Black in when he attended the famous school?
In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix the headquarters of the organization was in Sirius family home.

In 1933 Franklin Roosevelt was elected president. He promised to bring a New Deal to Americans to bring recovery from the Great Depression and improve social conditions. Which of the following did his New Deal include?

options.text: Programs to provide jobs by building roads, schools, dams, etc.
The Securities and Exchange Commission to regulate the stock market
Social Security that provided pensions for retired workers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: LEGO was the first company in Denmark to buy and use a plastic injection-molding machine for toys.
Many think that the closest the world came to nuclear war was in 1962 when President Kennedy demanded that the Soviets remove nuclear missiles they had recently placed in this country.
In 1963, the LEGO company replaced the building substance for the bricks, cellulose acetate with acrylonitrile butadiene stryrene, which improved the color quality.
In 1989, the LEGO company released a new series, named Pirates.
In 1934, Ole Kirk Christiansen named his toy-producing company LEGO, a word derived from the Danish phrase leg godt, which means what in English?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Play Well

questions.question: The Japanese defeat in this naval battle in the Pacific is generally considered to be the turning point of the Second World War.

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Series and Harry Potter
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, dies, half-blood. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In which two books did Harry Potter make a Patronus because he thought he saw a dementor, even though it was not really a dementor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Books 3 and 4

questions.question: In the Harry Potter series, what was the teaching position most coveted by Professor Snape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Defense Against the Dark Arts

questions.question: In the final book in the Harry Potter series, it is revealed that Harry names one of his sons after Snape.
In the final book of the Harry Potter series, Harry finally kills Snape.
Which of the following classes was taught by Professor Snape in the Harry Potter series?
What did Mr. Crouch from the Ministry of Magic call Percy in book 4 of the Harry Potter series?
What was the name of Sirius Blacks father in the Harry Potter series?
What was Snapes patronus in the Harry Potter series?
There were all types of enchantments guarding the Sorcerers Stone. Which teacher put the flying keys there to protect it in the first Harry Potter book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professor Flitwick

questions.question: In which Harry Potter novel did Sirius Black make his first major appearance?

options.text: Harry Potter and The Sorcerers Stone
Harry Potter and The Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry potter and The Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter and The Prisoner of Azkaban

questions.question: In the Harry Potter series, Professor Snape became headmaster of Hogwarts after the death of Dumbledore.
Sirius Black dies in the novel Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
What magical flying item of Sirius Black was given to Hagrid upon the knowledge of Harry Potters parents death?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A motorcycle

questions.question: What secret about Professor Snape was divulged in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, which is the final book in the series?

options.text: He was in love with Harrys mother.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was in love with Harrys mother.

questions.question: Is fictional character Snape the Half-Blood Prince?

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Half Blood Prince
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, brown, voldemorts. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Lord Voldemort had the ability to talk to these creatures.
The character of Sirius Black is mentioned in the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban for the first time.
In the book Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, a corpse that is re-animated but isn’t alive is called what?
What does Merope supposedly use to make Tom Riddle Sr. fall in love with her in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A love potion

questions.question: Harry destroyed two Horcruxes in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
Lavender Brown and Ron Won Won Weasley start going out in chapter 9 of Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, is Dumbledores blood the only blood used in the Cavern by the sea where the Horcrux is hidden?
Which of the following Harry Potter characters is not a prefect?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter

questions.question: Which of these characters does Harry kiss in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
In the sixth book of the Harry Potter series, Professor Slughorn became the Head of Slytherin.
What previously mentioned character was killed in chapter 1 of Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amelia Bones

questions.question: What is Lord Voldemorts real first name?
Which of these Hogwarts founders was Lord Voldemorts ancestor?
What was the very first of Lord Voldemorts horcruxes to appear in the Harry Potter series of books?
In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, Cho Chang waves to Harry once but then hurries away with Marietta.

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Book
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, best-selling, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What childrens novel features Neverland, the magical island where people cease to age?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter and Wendy

questions.question: In the first chapter of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, why was Snape late for a meeting with Lord Voldemort?

options.text: He forgot what time it was.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He discovered something important.

questions.question: Which of these Disney animated features is not based on a book written by an European author?

options.text: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh

questions.question: What best-selling novel tells the story of an orphan girl adopted by middle-aged siblings, Marilla and Matthew Cuthbert?

options.text: Little House in the Big Woods

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anne of Green Gables

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Severus Snape was headmaster for a period of time.
What classic fictional character is a long-nosed wooden puppet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both of these

questions.question: Which characters are not correctly matched with the authors who created them?

options.text: Lucy Pevensie, Caspian - C. S. Lewis
Joe Harper, Becky Thatcher  - Mark Twain
Meg March, Amy March - Louisa May Alcott

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mowgly, Raksha - Edgar Rice Burroughs

questions.question: What character from Antoine de Saint-Exupérys novella, The Little Prince, utters these famous lines that sum up the essence of the book: One cannot see well except with the heart, the essential is invisible to the eyes.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Fox

questions.question: Harry Potter defeats and kills Lord Voldemort in the final Harry Potter book.
This extraordinary strong, red-haired fictional character lives in Villa Villekula with a monkey, named Mr. Nilsson.
Lord Voldemort is related to Harry Potter.
What is the birth name of the author who penned The English Roses, a childrens book that follows the lives of four girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Madonna Louise Ciccone

questions.question: What childrens book author named one of his central characters after his son?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A. A. Milne

questions.question: Which of the following is not a character from Lewis Carrolls 1865 novel Alices Adventures in Wonderland?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Chief Weasel

questions.question: Which of these characters does Voldemort NOT kill in the final Harry Potter book Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Dollars
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, tickets, books. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The first sentence in the second chapter in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows is Harry was bleeding. Why is that so?

options.text: Harry got cut by a fragment of a mirror.
Dudley put a cup of tea right behind Harrys door and Harry stepped on it.
Dudley put a glass of water behind Harrys door and Harry stepped on it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry got cut by a fragment of a mirror.

questions.question: Which Weasley boy got his ear cut off in the last book of the Harry Potter series?
If Anthony had 8 apples, 2 oranges and 3 pears, how many pieces of fruit does Anthony have altogether?
If Lindsay had $20.00 and bought 3 tickets to the Mets game, how much money would Lindsay have left if each ticket cost 5 dollars?
How many inches are there in a foot?
What did Harry Potter say that his name was when he, Ron, and Hermione got caught by a gang of Snatchers in Harry Potter and the Deadly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vernon Dudley

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a Deathly Hallow?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Magical Mirror

questions.question: If Donna bought 5 blowpop lollipops from the candy store and gave her friend 2 of them, how many blowpops would Donna then have?
If T.J. went to the circus with 10 dollars and bought some fruit snacks for 3 dollars, how much money would T. J. then have left over?
How did Sirius Black escape from Azkaban, the wizard prison in the third book of the Harry Poter series?

options.text: He was able to contact his cousin Bellatrix who helped him escape from Azkaban.
He was able to control one of the dementors.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He transformed into a dog.

questions.question: What is the solution to this problem 12-3=?
What is the correct solution to this problem: 16 - 4 + 3 =?

Amanda went to the book store to buy some books. Her mom gave her a $10 bill. She bought two books that cost $2.00 each and a bookmark that cost $1.00. How much change did Amanda give her mother when she got home?
If Jane had $3.00 and went to the store and bought a yo yo for $1.00, how much would Jane have left?
If you add 3 to 5, what would be the result?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Harry Potter and Half Blood Prince
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, drama, mouseketeer. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Even without a permission slip, Harry Potter was able to go to Hogsmeade with Ron and Hermione during certain weekends.
Do Hermione and Ron secretly like each other in the sixth book of the Harry Potter series?
Who is the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher in Harry Potters third year at Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Remus Lupin

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, Rubeus Hagrid was appointed by Headmaster Albus Dumbledore as the new teacher of what subject?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Care of Magical Creatures

questions.question: Name the weekly ten-minute drama on the All-New Mickey Mouse Club starring Tony Lucca, Keri Russel and JC Chasez?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emerald Cove

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, The Minister of Magic came only once to visit the Prime Minister.
The Shrieking Shack, depicted in the Harry Potter books, was considered to be the most haunted place in Great Britain.
What was spattered over the wallpaper on Professor Slughorns house in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dragon blood

questions.question: What was the name of spell that Harry used on Malfoy in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
In 2000, this Mouseketeer became the youngest person to be both host and musical guest on Saturday Night Live.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Britney Spears

questions.question: Fictional character Remus Lupin was an animagus.
What is the spell incantation for conjuring a Patronus in the Harry Potter books?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Expecto Patronum

questions.question: Who wrote the magazine named Quibbler in the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luna Lovegoods father

questions.question: Who gave the Marauders Map to Harry in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fred and George

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, who delivered the Prime Minister the message that the Minister of Magic had sent?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An oil painting
